title: Blood Lord Vlad bug
body: Blood Lord Vlads blood ball he carries is missing particle effects and his E is bugged with his VO and sounds like classic Vlad {{champion:8}}

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix. :)

Hey Katey are you able to take a look into the missing particles again? This was never fixed and it currently looks like Blood Lord Vlad is carrying around a shiny ball of light. 

Thanks!

Sure thing - will be fixed next patch.

**EDIT**: Next patch being 8.7 'cause 8.6 comes out tomorrow. :o

While you are here.. please can you fix a vlad bug that he has had since release. Sometimes his Q will fizzle basically since it has a brief channel time if it cancels at an awkward moment either because the target died or he lost vision, then the ability goes on cooldown without going off , no crimson rush stack or anything. Maybe removing its channel time or shortening it would help. Thanks
